com.sadakatsu.clue.exception

Class DuplicateSuggestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.sadakatsu.clue.exception.DuplicateSuggestion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DuplicateSuggestion
extends java.lang.Exception
    An Exception that represents that a Player (server-side) or AI (client-side) tried to make the same Suggestion more than once. Doing so is a violation of the contest rules.
    Author:
    Joseph A. Craig
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DuplicateSuggestion(Player player, Suggestion suggestion)
      Instantiates a DuplicteSuggestion that reports that a connected Player attempted to make a Suggestion more than once.
      DuplicateSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion)
      Instantiates a DuplicateSuggestion that reports that an AI attempted to make a Suggestion more than once.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DuplicateSuggestion

        public DuplicateSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion)
        Instantiates a DuplicateSuggestion that reports that an AI attempted to make a Suggestion more than once.
        Parameters:
        suggestion - The Suggestion in question.

      • DuplicateSuggestion

        public DuplicateSuggestion(Player player,
                   Suggestion suggestion)
        Instantiates a DuplicteSuggestion that reports that a connected Player attempted to make a Suggestion more than once.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player that violated the rules.
        suggestion - The Suggestion that the Player tried to make more than once.
